post.body: rolled in open mat at another gym in Gilroy. Getting pretty serious with training now cuz I just got confirmed for 8 woman MMA tournament.
rolled with my teammates and new people at Kaijin in Santa Cruz. I was among the sucky people, but it's ok. I've learned to live with that.
is sipping hot chamomile tea..ahhhh..nice thing to calm the soul and think about tapping people out tomorrow in open mat.
is eating cereal for Xmas dinner while reading her new book. That's a ga-jillion times better than spending Xmas with a jerk. Peace ya'll.
is sitting comfortably on the couch reading her new business management book called "The Answer". So far so good. Not a bad use of my time.
spent two hours catching Tami's kicks and taking her down. Must have drilled our sequence 100 times. No more kickboxing until New Years
is excited Borders emailed her a 40% coupon for anything in the store. I'm so special. Probably gonna get a "For Dummies" book on something.
is freezing her proverbial balls off huddled in front of a space heater and sipping tea. It's sooooo cold in Nor Cal..BRRR friggin BRRRR!
got guillotined tonight while training partner was in my guard. Huh? How did that happen? Oh well. Never assume you're safe until you're out
just saw Drey's new promo trailer for Princesses of Pain. Looks really awesome! Can't wait to see the movie!
re-injured herself. Doh! In BJJ jacked the neck from being slightly slammed in BJJ. In San Shou, sweept an ankle hard with recovering instep
trained in leg catches and neck clenching techniques. Total of 4 ladies in MMA class today! Woo hoo!
is down to the yucky candy in her nephew's trick-or-treat bag. I'm such a loser.
ate too much chocolate cake today. Guess I better haul my sorry ass into training tonight.
loudly cursed at some booers tonight at the fights. Normally don't get that upset, but something about people booing fighters pisses me off.
is headed out to South San Francisco to watch 4 of her teammates fight in Muay Thai. So grateful for amatuer venues like this. GO TEAM!
did Marathon Fri at AKA and rolled with 3 different black belts! Also learned effective variation on arm triangle, one of my favorite subs.
is very raw at the both shoulder tops. Too much shrimping down the mat. For Pete's sake, must we shrimp that much in BJJ?
punched mitts so hard in training that my hands shake when I write, and my fingers ache when I make a fist. Love it! Love it!
is getting trained a lot with knee on belly these days. So funny how the big dudes are gingerly trying not to squish me during drills.
